message: Test cases generated from use case

test_cases.title: Successful password reset
preconditions: User is on the login page AND has a registered account

gherkin.given: User is on the login page
gherkin.when: Forgot password link is clicked and email address is entered
gherkin.then: Password reset email is sent to user's email

test_cases.expected_result: Password reset email is sent to user's email AND user receives confirmation message

test_cases.title: Invalid password reset attempt
preconditions: User is on the login page AND has a registered account

gherkin.given: User is on the login page
gherkin.when: Forgot password link is clicked and invalid email address is entered
gherkin.then: Invalid email address error message is displayed

test_cases.expected_result: Invalid email address error message is displayed AND user remains on login page

test_cases.title: Non-existent email password reset attempt
preconditions: User is on the login page

gherkin.given: User is on the login page
gherkin.when: Forgot password link is clicked and non-existent email address is entered
gherkin.then: Account not found error message is displayed

test_cases.expected_result: Account not found error message is displayed AND user remains on login page

test_cases.title: Empty fields password reset attempt
preconditions: User is on the login page

gherkin.given: User is on the login page
gherkin.when: Forgot password link is clicked and email field is left empty

test_cases.expected_result: Validation error message is displayed AND user remains on login page
